flawed_nl_solution:
Between Monday and Wednesday, she spends 1.5 hours + 1.5 hours = <<1.5+1.5=3>>3 hours.
That means she has 5 hours - 3 hours = <<5-3=6>>6 hours left for Tuesday and Wednesday
She spends 6 hours / 2=<<6/2=3>>3 hour on Friday
